db.messages.parser.error-invalid-date-fo: "{{str}}"  is not a valid date; expected format: YYYY-MM-DD
db.messages.parser.error-group-header-na: the name of the group is missing (group: ....)
the name of the group must not be empty
db.messages.parser.error-sql-invalid-rel: "{{str}}" must not be used as a relation-name
db.messages.parser.error-sql-invalid-col: "{{str}}" must not be used as a column-name
db.messages.parser.error-sql-having-with: having found but missing "group by" or aggregation
db.messages.parser.error-sqldump-invalid: invalid number of columns in line {{line}}
db.messages.parser.error-sqldump-insert-: number of values != number of columns
db.messages.parser.error-valueexpr-like-: right operand of LIKE must be a string literal
db.messages.exec.error-column-not-unique: could not add column "{{column}}" because of ambiguity
db.messages.exec.error-column-not-found-: could not find column "{{column}}" in schema {{schema}}
column index "{{column}}" is out of range in schema {{schema}}; index starts at 1
db.messages.exec.error-column-index-out-: column index "{{column}}" is out of range in  {{schema}}; index starts at 1
db.messages.exec.error-could-not-change-: could not set relation alias "{{alias}}" because of ambiguity
db.messages.exec.error-could-not-rename-: could not set new name "{{newName}}" for "{{oldName}}" because of ambiguity in {{schema}}
db.messages.exec.error-schemas-not-unifi: schemas are not unifiable: types are different or size is different: {{schemaA}}  and {{schemaB}}
db.messages.exec.error-column-not-in-bot: column "{{column}}" can not be found in both schemas of join
db.messages.exec.error-condition-must-be: condition must be a boolean expression
db.messages.exec.error-join-would-produc: join would result in non unique column names {{conflicts}}
db.messages.exec.error-datatype-not-spec: datatype for column {{index}} ("{{column}}") is not specified
db.messages.exec.error-function-expects-: function "{{func}}" expects arguments of type "{{expected}}" but "{{given}}" given
db.messages.exec.error-could-not-compare: could not compare value if types are different: {{typeA}} != {{typeB}}
db.messages.exec.error-function-expects-: {{func}} expects all arguments to be of the same type
db.messages.exec.error-case-when-conditi: the condition of a CASE WHEN must be of type boolean
db.messages.exec.error-case-when-expects: CASE WHEN condition THEN result END expects all results to be of the same type
db.messages.exec.error-invalid-date-form: "{{str}}"  is not a valid date; expected format: YYYY-MM-DD
db.messages.translate.error-variable-nam: name conflict: relation name "{{name}}" already exists
editor.codemirror-placeholder:
your query goes here ...

keyboard shortcuts:
	execute statement:    [CTRL]+[RETURN]
	execute selection:    [CTRL]+[SHIFT]+[RETURN]
	autocomplete:         [CTRL]+[SPACE]
editor.inline-relation-editor.error-wron: string must not contain single and double quotes
calc.messages.error-query-missing-assign: only assignments found; query is missing Help - Assignments
calc.menu.headline: load a Dataset
calc.menu.load-gist-headline: Load dataset stored in a gist
calc.menu.create-own-dataset-text: You can create your own dataset and share it with others. Learn more about it in the Maintainer Tutorial

π a, b ( A )
pi a, b A

σ a < b ∧ b ≠ c ( A )
sigma a < b and b != c A

σ x.a > 1 ( ρ x ( A ) )
σ A.y > 2 ( rho y←a ( A ) )

τ a asc, [2] desc ( A )
tau a asc, [2] desc ( A )

γ a, b; count(c)→c ( A )
gamma count(a)->x, sum(b)->y ( A )
calc.editors.ra.toolbar.and-content: σ a < b ∧ b ≠ c ( A )
calc.editors.ra.toolbar.xor-content: σ a < b ⊕ b ≠ c ( A )
calc.editors.ra.toolbar.or-content: σ a < b ∨ b ≠ c ( A )
calc.editors.ra.toolbar.natural-join-con:
( A ) ⋈ ( B )
( A ) ⋈ A.a ≥ B.a ( B )
calc.editors.ra.toolbar.left-outer-join-:
( A ) ⟕ ( B )
( A ) ⟕ A.a < B.a ( B )
calc.editors.ra.toolbar.right-outer-join:
( A ) ⟖ ( B )
( A ) ⟖ A.a < B.a ( B )
calc.editors.ra.toolbar.full-outer-join-:
( A ) ⟗ ( B )
( A ) ⟗ A.a != B.a ( B )

X = pi a ( A )
Y = pi b ( b )
( X ) ∪ ( Y )

calc.editors.sql.toolbar.select-content:
SELECT * FROM A

SELECT a, A.b, A.c FROM A
calc.editors.sql.toolbar.from-content:
SELECT *
FROM A, B as b
INNER JOIN C NATURAL
calc.editors.sql.toolbar.where-content:
SELECT * FROM A, B
where A.a = B.a or false
calc.editors.sql.toolbar.group-by-conten:
SELECT a, COUNT(b) as num
FROM A
GROUP BY a
calc.editors.sql.toolbar.having-content:
SELECT a, SUM(b) as sum
FROM A
GROUP BY a
having sum > 10
calc.editors.sql.toolbar.order-by-conten:
SELECT * FROM A ORDER BY a asc, b desc

SELECT * FROM A ORDER BY 1, 2, 3
